text: Sets up a defensive camp, allowing for building construction, recruitment and replenishment, regardless of territory.
There is no place for life in Nagash domain, flesh will rot and bones will crumble, even earth itself rises to form great walls to deter living invaders.
The world will submit and bow to the one True God.
Every defeated skeleton warrior is replaced by ten more as endless sea of undead marches on.
Nagash's pettiness doesn't stop at defeating a foe. And he is greatly bolstered by his satisfaction.
Predictably, Nagash has a hording problem.

I will occupy, I will help you die, I will run through you, now I rule you too.
A reaper of souls; a harvest of minds, willing or not, their wills be bind.

Shackled by the chains of life, set these mortals free.

Bestows a mystical barrier upon the ghost, augmenting magical resistance and deflecting the arcane energies that seek to disrupt the ethereal equilibrium.
